Allen Iverson scored 28 points after getting some advice from coach Doc Rivers at halftime.`` Doc Rivers said going into the half,` Be aggressive, but let it come to you,''' Allen Iverson said. I never think I'm not in my rhythm. It can be a grind as a shooter. As a scorer you're always trying to find something. Allen Iverson and Ben Gordon each had several clutch baskets in the second half as the former University of Connecticut guards battled for control of the game. to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of December 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google stock and controlled 9.6 percent of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000 shares of Class

Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. EDUCATION

According to Microsoft CEO, Steve Ballmer , Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business. Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud.
